verbose_text: Empagliflozin profoundly reduced CV mortality, whereas pioglitazone and GLP-1 RAs primarily reduced the risk of nonfatal MI and nonfatal stroke, so addition of empagliflozin to pioglitazone or a GLP-1 RA may produce a robust reduction in all three MACE components.
evidence: RAs primarily reduced the risk of nonfatal MI
